title: I CAN'T FIND ACCOUNT TRANSFER ON NEW CLIENT
body: Hi palz, i want to change my region which means i will transfer my account to another region but i can't find the account transfer stuff or name change. Can anyone tell where it is on new client?

replies.body:
Legacy Client Now Retired
BY CACTOPUS
Starting today, the legacy client is officially retired.
It has gone to a good, happy place with a lot of other very nice software. In this magical land, the sky is made of AOL internet trial offer CDs. BonziBUDDYs swing from treetop to treetop, happily making Vines and Geocities webpages. Everyone plays copies of E.T. for the Atari 2600—it's their favorite game. The legacy client will live happily ever after here, surrounded by friends. Not dead. And never forgotten.

"> [{quoted}](name=Ilai10,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BEG1EiY0,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-10-20T07:32:43.304+0000)
>
> Legacy Client Now Retired
> BY CACTOPUS
> Starting today, the legacy client is officially retired.
> It has gone to a good, happy place with a lot of other very nice software. In this magical land, the sky is made of AOL internet trial offer CDs. BonziBUDDYs swing from treetop to treetop, happily making Vines and Geocities webpages. Everyone plays copies of E.T. for the Atari 2600—it's their favorite game. The legacy client will live happily ever after here, surrounded by friends. Not dead. And never forgotten."

this poops up when I press the words in new client{{champion:25}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Most account modifications aren't available on the updated client yet.  You'll want to go back to the legacy client to process those.  You can do this by returning to the login screen, and selecting launch legacy client below the Sign In button.  Hope that helps!  
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg
I wanna know it too, I can't seem to find it.
